prompt: We have a 30x40 feet corner plot in a residential layout, with roads on the North and West sides. Design a G+1 3BHK house that takes advantage of the corner location for light and ventilation. Vastu compliant.
scratchpad: This is a corner plot, North and West roads. This is an excellent opportunity for design. The main entrance can be from the North or East, with North being ideal. I'll place the main entrance in the North. The West side can have a secondary entrance or large windows for the living/dining area. Ground floor: Living room in the NE (utilizing the corner), Kitchen in SE, a guest bedroom in the NW, and the staircase in the South. This keeps the NE light and open. First floor: Master bedroom in the SW, another bedroom in the SE, and a study/lounge in the NW. The corner allows for balconies on both floors facing the roads, enhancing the facade and providing outdoor space. The design will feature more glazing than a typical plot to capitalize on the natural light from two sides.
